pages.title: Illusion
pages.text: $(br)The $(key)Illusion Container$() can devour large amounts of $(mechanic/rarity#gear)gear$() and any enchanted items, converting them into $(bold)random materials$() of the same $(mechanic/rarity)rarity$() or a $(mechanic/enchant#omni)Book Of Omniscience$(). This is also the only way to obtain the $(mechanic/enchant#omni)Book Of Omniscience$().

$(br)$(key)Illusion Upgrade$() works like a backpack pickup upgrade, but automatically converts items as you pick them up. For safety, $(key)Illusion Upgrade$() will not convert items that have been enhanced by $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$().
